source.oracleReaderQuery: select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from dim_brand;

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * 
FROM dim_brand 
WHERE updated_at > TO_DATE('@{variables('max_date')}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
